1.title: Post Malone
1.description: A sample artist website to promote the release of Post Malone's album Beerbongs & Bentleys.

2.title: caption B
2.description: Create an online presence for the new fashion collection of film director, Be El Be, who is best known for directing music video for Young Thug, such as 'Best Friend', 'power', and 'With That'.

3.title: Snap Lenses
3.description: Created Snap experiences that launched with upwards of 2 million views for recording artists, such as Halsey, Logic, and Olivia O'Brien.
